name: helpful-utils-lite
description: Lightweight utility library with debounce, throttle, and memoize functions (lodash-lite alternative).

scripts.minify: npx -y google-closure-compiler --module_resolution BROWSER --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --env BROWSER --language_in ES_NEXT --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2020 --warning_level QUIET --js src/index.js --js_output_file dist/index.min.js #--module_resolution=NODE --chunk_output_type=ES_MODULES
scripts.minify-es: npx -y google-closure-compiler  --module_resolution NODE --compilation_level SIMPLE --env CUSTOM --language_in ES_NEXT --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2020 --warning_level QUIET --js src/index.js --js_output_file dist/index.es.min.js && echo 'export const debounce = debounce$$module$src$index;export const throttle = throttle$$module$src$index;export const memoize = memoize$$module$src$index;' >> ./dist/index.es.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify && npm run minify-es

author: santaklouse
